text: The 2007 enlargement of the European Union joined Bulgaria and Romania to the European Union. It happened on 1 January 2007. The Treaty of Accession was signed on April 25, 2005 at Luxembourg, Neumünster Abbey. It was the seventh time the Union accepted new members. == Membership == Since 1989, Bulgaria and Romania wanted to be a part of the European Union (EU)Chronology of the Fifth EU Enlargement, Foreign and Commonwealth Office of the United Kingdom and put forward to become members in 1995.Melanie H. Ram, Ph.D., Sub-regional Cooperation and European Integration: Romania’s Delicate Balance During the 2000s, Bulgaria and Romania made changes, such as improving their democratic system, human rights acts, freedom of speech acts, economy and laws. ==References== == Other websites == *Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Romania *Government of Romania *Ministry of European Integration *Gateway to the European Union *Infoeuropa Centre Category:European Union Category:21st century in Bulgaria Category:2000s in Romania Category:2007 in Europe
title: 2007 enlargement of the European Union
